name: Standard Window Border
desc: 9-slice tileable panel border. Dark wood frame with subtle gold inlay. Clean corners, 8px border thickness.

name: Memory Window Border
desc: 9-slice border with amber glow effect. Golden light emanates from frame edges. Used for memory-related panels.

name: Stagnation Window Border
desc: 9-slice border with cold crystal blue-white (#B0C4DE) frost pattern. Used for Preserver/stagnation UI contexts.
